"We've identified several time bombs put in place by D-arkers. Whatever happens, you must deal with them before they explode."
"Time bombs have a high destruction level, but if you can work out how it is put together, it's possible to deactivate them. Try inspecting the bomb carefully. "

"We can confirm all time bombs have been deactivated.

"We have detected an exploded time bomb.
......are you alright?"

"There is only one time bomb left."
"The time bomb in question has cooled down, and we noted it has lost its power. The deactivation was successful. "
"It appears there was a mistake in your input. It will take a while before you will be able to make a selection again. "
"You have 30 seconds remaining until the time bomb is up. Please inactivate them immediately. "

"We are currently at work dealing with D-arker time bombs.
We ask all members to partake in deactivating them. "
